message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer, but $14,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only afford up to $6,000. Would that work for you?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $14,000 represents fair market value, I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  This offer reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $11,500 is still a bit too high for my budget. Could we meet somewhere in the middle, perhaps around $7,500? I'm eager to make this work if possible.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $7,500 is significantly below its value.  I can go as low as $10,000.  This is my final offer, as I have another buyer ready at this price.
